title: Individual leasing is easier at The Foundry!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
At The Foundry, you will find premier apartment living.

Located in the heart of Carrollton, a flourishing city where all are welcomed, Timbercrest is a much-desired location for all professionals minutes away from The University of West Georgia, Southwire, Dekko, Amazon, and the charming downtown square.
Here at Timbercrest, you will be immersed in the excellent living experience from our state-of-the-art amenities to our remarkable customer service being unlike any other in town!
Water, Sewage, Cable, Internet, Trash, Pest Control
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven

Resort-Style Pool, State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, Free Weights, Cardio Equipment, Cycling Bikes, Strength Training Equipment, Picnic/Grilling Areas, Basketball Court, Study Lounge, Resident Game Room, Tanning Room, Located on UWG Off-Campus Bus Route, Concierge Services (Printing, Faxing, etc.), Package Acceptance, Complimentary Coffee Bar, Off-Leash Dog Park with Agility Obstacles
Gated entry, Gate Clicker, Key Faub Entry, Online Service Requests, Online Rent Payments
Spacious Closets with Built-In Shelving, Roommate Floor Plan Options, Breakfast Bar, Pool Views, Wood-Style Flooring*
